name: Defgene
description:
Just some game made for fun 

(the game is still under development, play the game to know the reason)

Controls:

  • WASD - move 
  • Left-click - shoot/place building 
  • Right-click - cancel place building 
  • Aim - use your mouse to point at the enemy

Useful Information: 

  • You need HQ to build additional buildings 
  • Red ball - enemy 
  • White square - raw scrap (gives 400 scraps, spawns randomly in-game) 
  • Grey button - cannot press/still under development 
  • HQ Locator - it gives u a pointer on the top right that points in the direction of ur HQ

Tips and Tricks:

  • Get the raw scrap before the enemies spawns
  • Raw scrap may take a while to find when u just start the game
  • Use walls to destroy stacks of enemy
  • Place your turret carefully
  • Mouse is recommended
  • The game may be rage-inducing when you try to get the raw scraps
  • Don't cheese the game by kiting the enemies, fight them
